    • Method Detail

      • scale

        public float scale()
        The scale value applied to vectors for the refraction effect. The effect works purely in screen-space and passing in a too-large value here will typically result in artifacts.
        Specified by:
        scale in interface R2RefractionMaskedDeltaParametersType
        Returns:
        A value by which to scale delta vectors for refraction
